				<div id="content">
					<ul id="breadcrumbs">
						<li class="level1"><a href="/" rel="home">Home</a></li>
						<li><a href="/Support/">Support</a></li>
						<li><a href="/Help/">Site Help</a></li>
						<li id="lastItem">Site Moved</li>
					</ul><!--End Breadcrumbs-->
					<h2 id="mainHeading">Site Moved</h2>
					
					<p>The Group 1 Software website has been discontinued and has been replaced by the Pitney Bowes Software website. 
						For support of your Group 1 Software product, visit <a href="http://www.g1.com/Support/" title="Group 1 Support website">http://www.g1.com/Support/</a>. 
						For information about our products, please visit <a href="http://www.pb.com/software" title="Pitney Bowes Software website">http://www.pb.com/software</a>.</p>
					
					
					<div class="clearer clearB"></div>
					<ul id="altPage">
						<li><a href="/Help/TellAFriend.asp" class="envelope">Tell a Friend</a></li>
					</ul>
					<div class="clearer clearR"></div>
				</div><!--End Content-->

			<div class="clearer clearL"></div>

               <div class="as-banner-content">
                <div class="pageTitle  ">
        	<h1 class="pageTitle-heading">Bem-vindo ao Suporte da Apple</h1><p class="pageTitle-intro">Estamos aqui para ajudar.</p></div>
	<section class="as-search" data-analytics-region="suggested search" role="section">
		<div class="as-search-content">
				<div class="row">
					<form action="https://support.apple.com/kb/index" method="get" id="as-search-form" class="as-search-form" data-suggestions-endpoint="https://www.apple.com/search-services/suggestions/" data-no-results-hint-text='Pressione enter para buscar' data-quick-links-heading='Links rápidos' data-suggested-results-heading='Buscas sugeridas' onsubmit="return false;">
						<input type="hidden" name="page" value="search">
						<input type="hidden" name="type" value="organic">
						<input type="hidden" name="src" id="src" value="support_searchbox_main">
						<input type="hidden" name="locale" id="as-search-locale" value="pt_BR">
						<label for="as-search-input" class="a11y"> Search Apple Support
						</label> 
						
						<input autocomplete="off" aria-expanded="false"
							class="as-search-form-input" id="as-search-input" placeholder="Buscar no Suporte" name="q" autocapitalize="none"
							spellcheck="false" autocorrect="off" type="text" value="" role="textbox">

						<button class="as-search-form-submit" type="submit" aria-label="Submit"></button>

						<button id="as-search-close" class="as-search-form-reset hidden">
							<span class="icon icon-closealt" id="as-search-close-icon" aria-hidden="true"></span>
							<span class="a11y">Close</span>
						</button>
					</form>
				</div>
				<div class="row">
					<div class="as-search-suggestions" id="as-search-suggestions-wrapper" aria-expanded="false">
						<span role="status" class="a11y"></span>

</section><div class="sectionTitle eyebrow  ">
			<h2 class="sectionTitle-heading">Selecione um produto</h2></div>
	<div class="as-imagegrid">       
		<div class=" as-imagegrid--6up  "/>
		    <div class="row">
		        <div class='as-imagegrid-item column large-2 medium-4 small-6'>
                    <a data-analytics-event="link.component_click" data-analytics-link-component_type="Image Grid" data-analytics-link-component_name="Apple Watch " data-analytics-link-url="/pt-br/watch" href="/pt-br/watch"><div class='as-imagegrid-img-cont'>
		                            <img height="123" alt="" width="65" class="as-imagegrid-img" src="/content/dam/edam/applecare/images/en_US/homepage/homepage_productnav_apple_watch_2x.png"></div>
		                        <span class="as-imagegrid-item-title"><span class="visuallyhidden">Suporte do </span>
 Apple Watch</span></a></div>
		        <div class='as-imagegrid-item column large-2 medium-4 small-6'>
                    <a data-analytics-event="link.component_click" data-analytics-link-component_type="Image Grid" data-analytics-link-component_name="iPhone " data-analytics-link-url="/pt-br/iphone" href="/pt-br/iphone"><div class='as-imagegrid-img-cont'>
		                            <img height="123" alt="" width="92" class="as-imagegrid-img" src="/content/dam/edam/applecare/images/en_US/homepage/homepage_productnav_iphone_2x.png"></div>
		                        <span class="as-imagegrid-item-title"><span class="visuallyhidden">Suporte do </span>
 iPhone</span></a></div>
		        <div class='as-imagegrid-item column large-2 medium-4 small-6'>
                    <a data-analytics-event="link.component_click" data-analytics-link-component_type="Image Grid" data-analytics-link-component_name="iPad " data-analytics-link-url="/pt-br/ipad" href="/pt-br/ipad"><div class='as-imagegrid-img-cont'>

 iPad</span></a></div>

                    <a data-analytics-event="link.component_click" data-analytics-link-component_type="Image Grid" data-analytics-link-component_name="Mac  " data-analytics-link-url="/pt-br/mac" href="/pt-br/mac"><div class='as-imagegrid-img-cont'>

 Mac</span></a></div>

                    <a data-analytics-event="link.component_click" data-analytics-link-component_type="Image Grid" data-analytics-link-component_name="Apple ID " data-analytics-link-url="/pt-br/apple-id" href="/pt-br/apple-id"><div class='as-imagegrid-img-cont'>

	</div>
    <div id="as-toggle-container-0" class="as-toggle-container ">
    <div class="as-toggle-nav-wrapper">
    
    <a class="as-toggle-nav" href="#as-toggle-content" data-btn-closed-copy="Mais produtos" data-analytics-event="link.component_click" data-analytics-link-component_type="Container" data-analytics-link-component_name="More products" data-analytics-btn-closed-copy="More products" data-analytics-btn-opened-copy="Fewer products" data-btn-opened-copy="Menos produtos" aria-controls="as-toggle-content-0" role="button" aria-expanded="true">

</div>


<div class="sectionTitle   ">
			<h2 class="sectionTitle-heading">Tópicos mais populares</h2></div>
	<div class='contentLink '><div class="u-layout u-layout--2up">
<div class="u-layout-item">
               <div class="contentLink-item">
                   <img height="150" alt="" width="240" class="contentLink-image" src="/content/dam/edam/applecare/images/en_US/mac/content-link-macfamily-icon_2x.jpg"><div class="contentLink-block">
                       			 <h3 class="contentLink-title">Novo usuário do Mac?</h3><p class="contentLink-copy">Sempre ficamos felizes ao receber um novo usuário do Mac. Veja aqui alguns tópicos que ajudarão você a começar.


</p><a class="contentLink-link " href="/pt-br/explore/new-to-mac" data-analytics-event="link.component_click" data-analytics-link-component_type="Content Link" data-analytics-link-component_name="Get to know your Mac" data-analytics-link-url="/pt-br/explore/new-to-mac">		    
                            			<span class="contentLink-text">Conheça seu Mac</span><span class="icon icon-chevronright" aria-hidden="true"></span></a>		
                        			</div>
                        </div>
 			</div>
        <div class="u-layout-item">
               <div class="contentLink-item">
                   <img height="150" alt="" width="240" class="contentLink-image" src="/content/dam/edam/applecare/images/en_US/iphone/content-link-new-to-iphone-icon_2x.jpg"><div class="contentLink-block">
                       			 <h3 class="contentLink-title">Trocando para o iPhone? </h3><p class="contentLink-copy">Ajudaremos você a configurar seu novo iPhone e mostraremos alguns dos recursos incríveis que o acompanham.</p><a class="contentLink-link " href="/pt-br/explore/new-to-iphone" data-analytics-event="link.component_click" data-analytics-link-component_type="Content Link" data-analytics-link-component_name="Get to know your iPhone" data-analytics-link-url="/pt-br/explore/new-to-iphone">		    
                            			<span class="contentLink-text">Conheça seu iPhone</span><span class="icon icon-chevronright" aria-hidden="true"></span></a>		
                        			</div>
                        </div>
 			</div>
        </div></div>
<div class="divider divider--fullwidth">
  			<hr aria-hidden="true"/>
		</div>
	<div class="heroImage">
        <img height="80" alt="" width="80" class="cq-dd-image hero-image" src="/content/dam/edam/applecare/images/en_US/programsservices/appleserviceprograms/applecare/promo-icon-applecare_products_2x.png"></div>

    <div class="sectionTitle   ">
			<h2 class="sectionTitle-heading">AppleCare e garantia</h2><p class="sectionTitle-intro">Obtenha cobertura de reparos e suporte adicional da Apple com as pessoas que mais conhecem os produtos Apple. Descubra se o produto ainda está na garantia ou saiba mais sobre como comprar produtos do AppleCare.</p></div>
	<div class="promo as-center "> 
        <div class="u-layout u-layoutTable u-layout--3up"><a class="promo-item u-layoutTable-item" data-analytics-event="link.component_click" data-analytics-link-component_type="Promo" data-analytics-link-component_name="default-promo" data-analytics-link-url="https://checkcoverage.apple.com/br/pt/" href="https://checkcoverage.apple.com/br/pt/"><img height="40" alt="" width="40" class="promo-image" src="/content/dam/edam/applecare/images/en_US/promo_icons/promo-icon-warranty_2x.png"><div class="promo-link">
                        <span class="promo-text">
                        Meu produto ainda está dentro da garantia?</span><span class="icon icon-chevronright" aria-hidden="true"></span>
                    </div></a><a class="promo-item u-layoutTable-item" data-analytics-event="link.component_click" data-analytics-link-component_type="Promo" data-analytics-link-component_name="default-promo" data-analytics-link-url="https://www.apple.com/br/support/products/" href="https://www.apple.com/br/support/products/"><img height="40" alt="" width="40" class="promo-image" src="/content/dam/edam/applecare/images/en_US/promo_icons/promo-icon-applecare-products_2x.png"><div class="promo-link">
                        <span class="promo-text">
                        Saiba sobre os produtos AppleCare</span><span class="icon icon-chevronright" aria-hidden="true"></span>
                    </div></a><a class="promo-item u-layoutTable-item" data-analytics-event="link.component_click" data-analytics-link-component_type="Promo" data-analytics-link-component_name="default-promo" data-analytics-link-url="https://selfsolve.apple.com/agreement/br/pt/list" href="https://selfsolve.apple.com/agreement/br/pt/list"><img height="40" alt="" width="40" class="promo-image" src="/content/dam/edam/applecare/images/en_US/promo_icons/promo-icon-register-manage_2x.png"><div class="promo-link">
                        <span class="promo-text">
                        Gerenciar e registrar planos</span><span class="icon icon-chevronright" aria-hidden="true"></span>
                    </div></a></div></div>

<div class="divider divider--fullwidth">
  			<hr aria-hidden="true"/>
		</div>
	<div class="heroImage">
        <img height="80" alt="" width="80" class="cq-dd-image hero-image" src="/content/dam/edam/applecare/images/en_US/promo_icons/large-promo-repair-icon_2x.png"></div>

    <div class="sectionTitle   ">
			<h2 class="sectionTitle-heading">Reparo e serviço</h2><p class="sectionTitle-intro">Encontre a opção mais conveniente para obter um reparo para seu produto Apple ou verifique o progresso de um reparo atual.</p></div>
	<div class="as-navLink-wrapper as-navLink--icon">
			<div class="as-navLink-inner ">
				<a class="as-navLink" href="/pt-br/repair" data-analytics-event="link.component_click" data-analytics-link-component_name="See repair options" data-analytics-link-url="/pt-br/repair">
                            <span class="as-navlink-text">Ver as opções de reparo</span><span class="icon icon-chevronright" aria-hidden="true"></span>
						</a>
					</div>
		</div>
	<div class="richText">
  			<div class="table-responsive">
				<p class="as-center">Verifique o <a href="https://checkrepair.apple.com/br/pt/">status de um reparo</a> que j&aacute; come&ccedil;ou.</p></div>
		</div>
	<div class="divider">
  			<hr aria-hidden="true" />
		</div>
	<div class="richText">
  			<div class="table-responsive">
				<h3 class="as-center">Tome cuidado com pe&ccedil;as falsificadas</h3> 
<p class="as-center">&Eacute; poss&iacute;vel que adaptadores de alimenta&ccedil;&atilde;o e baterias de terceiros ou falsificadas n&atilde;o tenham sido desenvolvidos adequadamente, e seu uso pode resultar em problemas de seguran&ccedil;a.</p> 
<p class="as-center">Para garantir que voc&ecirc; tenha uma bateria leg&iacute;tima da Apple durante uma substitui&ccedil;&atilde;o da bateria, recomendamos que voc&ecirc; compare&ccedil;a a uma <a href="http://www.apple.com/br/retail/" class="analytics-exitlink">Apple&nbsp;Store</a> ou um <a href="https://locate.apple.com/br/pt/" class="analytics-exitlink">Centro de Servi&ccedil;o Autorizado Apple (AASP)</a>. Se voc&ecirc; precisar de um adaptador de substitui&ccedil;&atilde;o para carregar um dispositivo Apple, recomendamos obter um adaptador de alimenta&ccedil;&atilde;o da Apple.</p></div>
		</div>
	<div class="divider divider--fullwidth">
  			<hr aria-hidden="true"/>
		</div>
	<div class="heroImage">
        <img height="80" alt="" width="80" class="cq-dd-image hero-image" src="/content/dam/edam/applecare/images/en_US/promo_icons/large-promo-icon-asc-2_2x.png"></div>

    <div class="sectionTitle   ">
			<h2 class="sectionTitle-heading">Comunidades de suporte da Apple</h2><p class="sectionTitle-intro">Encontre e compartilhe soluções com outros usuários da Apple no mundo inteiro.</p></div>
	<div class="as-navLink-wrapper as-navLink--icon">
			<div class="as-navLink-inner ">
				<a class="as-navLinkanalytics-exitlink" href="https://communities.apple.com/pt" data-analytics-event="link.component_click" data-analytics-link-component_name="Join the conversation" data-analytics-link-url="https://communities.apple.com/pt">
                            <span class="as-navlink-text">Participe da conversa</span><span class="icon icon-chevronright" aria-hidden="true"></span>
						</a>
					</div>
		</div>
	<div class="divider divider--fullwidth">
  			<hr aria-hidden="true"/>
		</div>
	<div class="sectionTitle eyebrow  ">
			<h2 class="sectionTitle-heading">Contato do Suporte da Apple</h2></div>
	<div class="sectionTitle   ">
			<h3 class="sectionTitle-heading">Como podemos ajudar?</h3><p class="sectionTitle-intro">Obtenha suporte por telefone, bate-papo ou e-mail, configure um reparo ou faça um agendamento no Genius Bar.</p></div>
	<div class="as-navLink-wrapper as-navLink--button">
			<div class="as-navLink-inner ">
				<a class="as-navLink button" data-analytics-event="link.component_click" data-analytics-link-component_name="Get Support" data-analytics-link-url="https://getsupport.apple.com/?caller=home&amp;PRKEYS=" href="https://getsupport.apple.com/?caller=home&PRKEYS=" rel="nofollow">Obtenha suporte</a></div>
		</div>
	<div class="divider divider--fullwidth">
  			<hr aria-hidden="true"/>
		</div>
	<section class="as-columns  as-columns--1up  as-banner ">
   <div class="row">
       <div class="column large-12 medium-12 small-12">
               <div class='as-banner-cont'>
                       <div class='as-banner-image as-banner-image--inline-1'>

       	        </div>
               <div class="as-banner-content">
                <div class="as-banner-row">  
                <div class="sectionTitle  as-left ">
			<h2 class="sectionTitle-heading">Aproveite workshops gratuitos na loja.</h2><p class="sectionTitle-intro">Inscreva-se para aprender o básico ou aprimorar ainda mais suas habilidades.</p></div>
	<div class="as-navLink-wrapper as-navLink--icon">
			<div class="as-navLink-inner as-left">
				<a class="as-navLink" href="http://www.apple.com/br/retail/learn/" data-analytics-event="link.component_click" data-analytics-link-component_name="default-simplelink" data-analytics-link-url="http://www.apple.com/br/retail/learn/">
                            <span class="as-navlink-text">Encontre um workshop perto de você</span><span class="icon icon-chevronright" aria-hidden="true"></span>
						</a>
					</div>
		</div>
	</div>
                </div>
                </div>
       </div>
</section><div class="simple-list-wrapper as-center">
					<h2>Programas de extensão de reparo e troca</h2><ul>
    		<li>
           				<a class="simple-list-link" data-analytics-event="link.click" data-analytics-link-component_type="Simple List" data-analytics-link-component_name="iPhone 5 Sleep/Wake Button Replacement Program" data-analytics-link-url="http://www.apple.com/br/support/iphone6s-unexpectedshutdown/" href="http://www.apple.com/br/support/iphone6s-unexpectedshutdown/">Programa do iPhone 6s para problemas de desligamentos inesperados</a></li>
				<li>
           				<a class="simple-list-link" data-analytics-event="link.click" data-analytics-link-component_type="Simple List" data-analytics-link-component_name="iSight Camera Replacement for iPhone 6 Plus" data-analytics-link-url="http://www.apple.com/br/support/iphone6plus-multitouch/" href="http://www.apple.com/br/support/iphone6plus-multitouch/">Programa de reparo da tela Multi-Touch para iPhone 6 Plus</a></li>
				<li>
           				<a class="simple-list-link" data-analytics-event="link.click" data-analytics-link-component_type="Simple List" data-analytics-link-component_name="Apple AC Wall Plug Adapter Exchange Program" data-analytics-link-url="http://www.apple.com/br/support/ac-wallplug-adapter/" href="http://www.apple.com/br/support/ac-wallplug-adapter/">Programa de troca do adaptador para conector de parede CA da Apple</a></li>
				<li>
           				<a class="simple-list-link" data-analytics-event="link.click" data-analytics-link-component_type="Simple List" data-analytics-link-component_name="Apple USB-C Charge Cable Replacement Program" data-analytics-link-url="http://www.apple.com/br/support/usbc-chargecable/" href="http://www.apple.com/br/support/usbc-chargecable/">Programa de substituição do cabo carregador USB-C da Apple</a></li>
				<li>
           				<a class="simple-list-link" data-analytics-event="link.click" data-analytics-link-component_type="Simple List" data-analytics-link-component_name="All Programs" data-analytics-link-url="http://www.apple.com/br/support/exchange_repair/" href="http://www.apple.com/br/support/exchange_repair/">Todos os programas</a></li>
				</ul>
	</div>
    		</div>
   	 <footer id="ac-globalfooter" class="no-js" lang="pt-BR" data-analytics-region="global footer" role="contentinfo" aria-labelledby="ac-gf-label">
            	<div class="ac-gf-content">
            		<h2 class="ac-gf-label" id="ac-gf-label">Apple Footer</h2>
                <nav class="ac-gf-breadcrumbs" aria-label="Breadcrumbs" role="navigation">
                    <a href="https://www.apple.com/br/" class="home ac-gf-breadcrumbs-home analytics-exitlink">
                        <span class="ac-gf-breadcrumbs-home-icon icon icon-apple" aria-hidden="true"></span>
                        <span class="ac-gf-breadcrumbs-home-label">Apple</span> 
                        <span class="ac-gf-breadcrumbs-home-chevron"></span> 
                        <span class="ac-gf-breadcrumbs-home-mask"></span> 
                    </a>
                    <div class="ac-gf-breadcrumbs-path">
                        <ol class="ac-gf-breadcrumbs-list" vocab="http://schema.org/" typeof="BreadcrumbList">
							<li class="ac-gf-breadcrumbs-item" property="itemListElement" typeof="ListItem">
			<span property="name">Suporte</span>
                            <meta property="position" content="1">
                        </li>
		</ol>
                    </div>
 </nav>
                <nav class="ac-gf-directory with-4-columns" aria-label="Apple Directory" role="navigation">
	<div class="ac-gf-directory-column">
               		<div class="ac-gf-directory-column-section">

"),version:e[1],frameworkVersion:e[2]};return null},e=function(){var n,e;e=l(),null!==e&&e.frameworkVersion&&(n=parseInt(e.frameworkVersion,10),n>=1&&(document.documentElement.className+=" glb-on-app"))};try{new n("test")}catch(o){t=o,n=function(n,e){var t;return e=e||{bubbles:!1,cancelable:!1,detail:void 0},t=document.createEvent("CustomEvent"),t.initCustomEvent(n,e.bubbles,e.cancelable,e.detail),t},n.prototype=window.Event.prototype,window.CustomEvent=n}a=null;try{a=localStorage.getItem("glbOnApp"),a&&(document.documentElement.className+=" function(n){return e.complete(n,i,o,u,c,r)}}(this),e+=-1===e.indexOf("?")?"?callback="+s:"&callback="+s,l=a(s),l.src=e,void f.appendChild(l))},e.prototype.get=function(e,n){return e.prototype.insertJsOnScriptTag=function(e,n,t){var o;return t&&(n+="\n//# sourceMappingURL="+t),o=document.createTextNode(n),e.appendChild(o)},e.prototype.injectScriptTag=function(e,n,t,o){var r;r=a(t),r.src=n,f.appendChild(r)},e.prototype.injectScript=function(e,n,t,o){var r;r=a(t),this.insertJsOnScriptTag(r,n,o),f.appendChild(r)},e.prototype.injectLinkTag=function(e,n,t,o){var r;r=document.createElement("link"),r.id=t,r.type="text/css",r.rel="stylesheet",r.href=n,f.appendChild(r)},e.prototype.injectStylesheet=function(e,n,t,o){i(n,t,o,null)},e.prototype.defaultHandler=function(e,n,t,o){window["tinyBasketResult"+e]=window["tinyBasketResult"+e]||{},window["tinyBasketResult"+e][t.toString()]=n},e.prototype.getHandler=function(e,n){return"js"===e?n?this.injectScriptTag:this.injectScript:"css"===e?n?this.injectLinkTag:this.injectStylesheet:this.defaultHandler},e.prototype.skipCacheRequestManager=function(e,n){return n.success(e)},e.prototype.getRequestManager=function(e,n){return!n||"js"!==e&&"css"!==e?"jsonp"===e?ajaxCache.getJsonp:ajaxCache.get:this.skipCacheRequestManager},e.prototype.require=function(e,n){var t,o,r,i,s,a,c,l,u,p,g,f,w;if(o=this,e)for(m(e)||(e=[e]),i=0,a=e.length;a>i;i++)l=e[i],w=l.url,f=l.type,u=l.skipCache||n,null==f&&(f=w.split("."),f=f[f.length-1]),r=this.getHandler(f,u),c=this.getRequestManager(f,u),g=l.success||function(){},p=l.sourceMap||"",s=l.id||l.key||"ajax-cache-id-"+Math.round(1e5*Math.random()),"string"==typeof g&&(g=window[g]&&"function"==typeof window[g]?window[g]:function(){}),t=function(e,n,t,r,i){return function(s){n.call(o,e,s,r,i),t(s)}},c(w,d(l,{success:t(f,r,g,s,p)}))},e}(),window.tinyBasket=new r,"undefined"!=typeof n&&n.exports&&(n.exports=window.tinyBasket)},{}]},{},[3]);</script><script>(function(){var n;window.glb=window.glb||{},glb.cdnComponents=glb.cdnComponents||[],glb.cdnComponents.push("menu"),glb.menuReady=!0,n=null!==window.noAutoLoadFN&&window.noAutoLoadFN,n||(glb.fnTimeoutMs=glb.fnTimeoutMs||2e3,null!==glb.fnTimeout&&clearTimeout(glb.fnTimeout),glb.menuReady&&glb.headerReady&&glb.reguaReady?glb.initFnCdn(glb.cdnConfig):glb.fnTimeout=setTimeout(function(){return </div><div id="glb-corpo" class="glb-corpo"><div class="publicidade publicidade-banner_floating"><div id="banner_floating" class="tag-manager-publicidade-container"></div></div><div class="row show-for-medium-up"><div class="column

class="feed-text-wrapper"><div class="feed-post-header with-post-chapeu"><span class="feed-post-header-chapeu">respeito</span><span class="feed-post-time"><i class="feed-post-time-icon gui-icon                     #Partiu conhece as belezas e as aventuras da cidade de Cruz
                </p></div></a></div></div></section></div><script type="text/javascript">
        (function () {
            var jqueryTimeout;
            var JQUERY_TIMEOUT = 1000;

            var jqueryTimeoutSetup = function() {
                jqueryTimeout = window.setTimeout(postJquerySetup, JQUERY_TIMEOUT);
            };

            var postJquerySetup = function() {
                if(typeof $ !== 'undefined' && typeof CardDeVideos !== 'undefined') {
                    var initCard = function() {
                        new CardDeVideos('#card-de-videos-62b6e2d3-78b2-4f6a-b647-1d77317e149f');
                    };
                    initCard();
                    clearTimeout(jqueryTimeout, JQUERY_TIMEOUT);
                } else {
                    if(document.readyState !== 'complete') {
                        jqueryTimeoutSetup();
                    }
                    else {
                        clearTimeout(jqueryTimeout, JQUERY_TIMEOUT);
                        console.log('[Card de Videos] Jquery ou CardDeVideos não foi carregado.');
                    }
                }
            };
            postJquerySetup();
        })();
    </script></div><div class="publicidade publicidade-banner_rm3"><div id="banner_rm3" class="tag-manager-publicidade-container"></div></div></div></div><div class="row"><div class="areatemplate-inferior
                column
                small-24
                medium-20 medium-offset-2
                large-24 large-offset-0
                xlarge-22 xlarge-offset-1"></div></div><link type="text/css" rel="stylesheet" media="screen" href="http://s.glbimg.com/og/rg/static/commons/css/publicidade.css" /><div class="row"><div class="column
                    small-24
                    medium-20 medium-offset-2
                    large-24 large-offset-0
                    xlarge-22 xlarge-offset-1"><div class="row gui-shopping show-for-medium-up"><div class="columns"><div id="vitrine"></div><script defer src="http://vitrines.globo.com/vitrine/vitrine.min.js"></script><script>
                document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function(){
                    new Vitrine({
                        sitepage: 'redeglobo/home',
                        text_color: '009ddb',
                    }).init();
                });
            </script></div></div></div></div></div><div class="row"><div class="column
                small-24
                medium-20 medium-offset-2 
                large-24 large-offset-0
                xlarge-22 xlarge-offset-1"></div></div><div class="row show-for-medium-down"><div class="small-24 column publicidade-container"><div class="publicidade publicidade-banner_mobile_fim"><div id="banner_mobile_fim" class="tag-manager-publicidade-container"></div></div></div></div><footer id="glb-rodape" class="glb-rodape"><div id="glb-rodape" class="widget_rodape_container"><div class="footer product-color" data-ga-area="footer"><div class="grid-12 container row clearfix" data-ga-marker="links"><div class="column"><ul class="first-line"><li class="ib middle"><a class="logo" href="//globo.com/" title="Globo.com">Globo.com</a></li><li class="ib middle"><a href="//g1.globo.com/">g1</a></li><li class="ib middle"><a href="//globoesporte.globo.com/">globoesporte</a></li><li class="ib middle"><a href="//gshow.globo.com/">gshow</a></li><li class="ib middle"><a href="//famosos.globo.com/">famosos & etc</a></li><li class="ib middle"><a href="//globotv.globo.com/">vídeos</a></li><li class="ib middle"><a href="//www.globo.com/todos-os-sites.html">todos os sites</a></li><li class="pushed ib middle"><span>globo</span></li></ul><span class="pull-left">&copy; Copyright 2000-2017 Globo Comunicação e Participações S.A.</span><ul class="footer-menu"><li class="ib middle"><a href="//www.globo.com/privacidade.html">política de privacidade e segurança</a></li><li class="ib middle"><a href="//meuperfil.globo.com">central globo.com</a></li><li class="ib middle"><a href="//assine.globo.com/">assine a globo.com</a></li><li class="last ib middle"><a href="//anuncie.globo.com/">anuncie conosco</a></li></ul></div></div></div></div></footer></div><script defer src="http://s3.glbimg.com/cdn/libs/jQuery.dotdotdot/1.7.4/jquery.dotdotdot.min.js"></script><script type="text/javascript" src="http://s.glbimg.com/og/rg/static/CACHE/js/23bcc4c153e1.js"></script><link rel="stylesheet" href="http://s.glbimg.com/gl/ba/css/barra-globocom.min.css" type="text/css" /><script type="text/javascript">
            var glb = this.glb || {};
            glb.barra = {
                exibeAssineJa: true,
                exibeCentral: true,
                itemCustomizado: {
                    cor: "#0669de",
                    texto: "",

            };
            (function() {
                var s = document.createElement("script");
                s.type = "text/javascript"; s.async = true; s.charset = "utf-8";
                s.src = "http://s.glbimg.com/gl/ba/js/barra-globocom.min.js";
                var ss = document.getElementsByTagName("script")[0]; ss.parentNode.insertBefore(s, ss);
            })();
        </script></body>
